text: Álvaro Colom Caballeros (; June 15, 1951 - January 23, 2023) was a Guatemalan politician. He was the President of Guatemala from 2008 to 2012.Pico, Juan Hernandez.Can Alvaro Become a Social Democratic President? ," Revista Envio. (accessed February 1, 2010). Colom died at a hospital in Guatemala City, Guatemala from esophageal cancer at the age of 71. ==References== Category:Presidents of Guatemala Category:1951 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Deaths from esophageal cancer
title: Álvaro Colom
